alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 11:43PM PDT until August 13 at 2:45AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 245 AM PDT. * At 1143 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain east of Indio along Interstate 10 to Mecca. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Coachella, Thermal, Mecca, Interstate 10 east of Indio. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
